title: Adam Has An Oeuf (The Adam and Dr. Drew Show Classics)
itunes:title: Adam Has An Oeuf (The Adam and Dr. Drew Show Classics)
description: Adam and Drew open up this week's episode talking about Demi Lovato's drug overdose and hospitalization which leads into a discussion of outrage becoming the sole social currency. The guys welcome back Theo Von to the show by talking about Theo's unusual upbringing in Louisiana and a hometown hoops hero. The conversation then turns to a harrowing tale of egg, cheese and disappointment.
